arts.ttl: Longo: Milan to scout defender during Udinese-Cagliari with January move possible
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller After a successful start to the season, AC Milan are already thinking about how they can strengthen the squad in January, at least according to a report. Massimiliano Allegri and his men currently have four wins to their name, out of a possible five, and currently sit at the top of the standings. In short, […] The post Longo: Milan to scout defender during Udinese-Cagliari with January move possible appeared first on SempreMilan.
